entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.52
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Helm Chart: Add option to set resource limits for initContainer. Thanks to mreichelt-dicos.
  • Helm Chart: Fixes for mongodb persistence. Please test is this correct. Thanks to emoritzx.
  • Helm Chart: Added info about rarely used running WeKan at subpath. Thanks to emoritzx.

and adds the following updates:

  • Updated dependencies. Part 1, Part 2, Part 3, Part 4, Part 5, Part 6, Part 7. Thanks to dependabot.
  • Added RepoCloud SaaS. Part 1, Part 2, Part 3. Thanks to RepoCloud.
  • Updated WeKan app webmanifest. Thanks to xet7.
  • Revert forking of ldapjs. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fixes to Clean light and Clean dark themes. Thanks to abramchikd.
  • Activities, adding back "created at" field. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Fix typos at attachments code. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.53
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Added Dragscroll to scroll the board. Click on an empty space in the board, hold the left mouse and move left and right to scroll the board easily. Thanks to mfilser.

and adds the following updates:

  • Updated release script: New install webpage location. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated dependencies. Thanks to developers of dependencies.
  • Copied changes from wiki to docs. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated Snap Candidate to MongoDB 6.0.16. Thanks to MongoDB developers.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Board Menu Popup's were opened twice because of 2 same event creation. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Fixing of "mode is undefined" on first activity component creation. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Changing card color now closes the popup and doesn't refresh the whole board page. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Fix dragscroll package name. Thanks to xet7.
  • Reducing card size in database if no planning poker was started. Thanks to mfilser.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.54
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Helm Chart: Add Support for Overriding Image Registry in Airgapped Environments. Thanks to geilername.
  • PWA, move to standalone (standard) to display the status bar Thanks to mfilser.
  • Added info how with Caddy webserver config, PWA and Android app override icons, showing toolbars, etc. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Don't set background image in .board-canvas too. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Bugfix, variable "color" didn't exist. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Little opacity to minicards to see the background image a little bit. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Remove attachment storage name from attachment list. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Attachment popup back was broken since new attachment viewer, now fixed. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Change Meteor.user() to ReactiveCache.getCurrentUser(). Thanks to mfilser.
  • Fix empty parentId in cards. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Sidebar xmark icon, add padding and background color. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Board view, first column a bit smaller to save screen space. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Minicard, show creator, defaultValue of schema and other code is now the same. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Editor, Bugfix, copy text is now at each editor (textarea) again. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Bugfix, Cards Count on mobile view was missing. Thanks to mfilser.
  • ListHeader, simpler code logic at collapsed if conditions. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Bugfix, edit description didn't work if it was clicked. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Fix LDAP login fails after upgrade. Thanks to juppees and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.56
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Updated Browser compatibility matrix. Part 1, Part 2.
  • Updated code of conduct. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated Docker build actions. Thanks to dependabot.
  • Updated docs for building custom Docker image. Part 1, Part 2, Part 3.
  • Update mongodb chart version to 15.6.18 and enables wekan to be deployed on an OpenShift cluster. Thanks to fobrice.
  • Upgraded Snap Candidate MongoDB to 6.0.17. Thanks to MongoDB developers.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix ModernDark Mobile View List Titles. Thanks to walster001.
  • Fix apparmor denied in syslog at Snap Candidate. Thanks to webenefits and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
